ResponseWithContextAsync(ChatTriggers, IUserMessage, DiscordSocketClient, bool, MewdekoContext)

Generates a response string with context asynchronously based on the provided parameters.

Declaration
public static Task<string?> ResponseWithContextAsync(this ChatTriggers cr, IUserMessage ctx, DiscordSocketClient client, bool containsAnywhere, MewdekoContext context = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ChatTriggers cr

The chat trigger model.
IUserMessage ctx

The message context.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord socket client.
bool containsAnywhere

Boolean value indicating whether the trigger is contained anywhere in the message.
MewdekoContext context

Optional: The database context. Default is null.
Returns
Type Description
Task<string>

Send(ChatTriggers, IUserMessage, DiscordSocketClient, bool, MewdekoContext)

Sends a message based on the provided chat trigger asynchronously.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
ChatTriggers ct

The chat trigger model.
IUserMessage ctx

The message context.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord socket client.
bool sanitize

Boolean value indicating whether to sanitize mentions in the response.
MewdekoContext dbContext

Optional: The database context. Default is null.
Returns
Type Description
Task<IUserMessage>

The sent user message or null if no response is required.

SendInteraction(ChatTriggers, SocketInteraction, DiscordSocketClient, bool, IUserMessage, bool, MewdekoContext, bool)

Sends a message based on the provided chat trigger and interaction asynchronously.

Declaration
public static Task<IUserMessage>? SendInteraction(this ChatTriggers ct, SocketInteraction inter, DiscordSocketClient client, bool sanitize, IUserMessage fakeMsg, bool ephemeral = false, MewdekoContext dbContext = null, bool followup = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ChatTriggers ct

The chat trigger model.
SocketInteraction inter

The socket interaction.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord socket client.
bool sanitize

Boolean value indicating whether to sanitize mentions in the response.
IUserMessage fakeMsg

The fake user message for context.
bool ephemeral

Boolean value indicating whether the response should be ephemeral. Default is false.
MewdekoContext dbContext

Optional: The database context. Default is null.
bool followup

Boolean value indicating whether to send a follow-up response. Default is false.
Returns
Type Description
Task<IUserMessage>

The sent user message or null if no response is required.
